messages.content: Join us in voting DAVID DREW back into Parliament, so he can get back to representing STROUD constituents and their needs, as he did so well for 13 years, between 1997 and 2010.
Let's send DAVID DREW back to Parliament along with a message from STROUD that STROUD HAS HAD ENOUGH OF CUTS AND OF AUSTERITY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: David Drew will fight for affordable housing.
David Drew will fight for the NHS.
David Drew will fight for fairer taxation.
David Drew will fight to invest in jobs and people.
David Drew and the Labour Party will fight for a dignified welfare system and abolishing cruel assessments.
David Drew and the Labour Party will fight for reversing massive cuts to education.
David Drew will fight for a softer Brexit that will work for Stroud and for every community in Britain.
